column5: This tudor style house is a charming 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home located in the Arts & Cultural District of Ft. Worth. Located just one block off of the red brick road 'Camp Bowie'. One bedroom has a king bed with the ensuite bathroom. The 2nd and 3rd bedrooms each have queen beds. Less than a three minute car ride the to famous Kimball Art Museum, Amon Carter, Modern Art Museum, Cowgirl Hall of Fame, and the hands on family friendly Ft. Worth Museum of Science & History.
